plot: During the war, Avag's son sends his photo to the family asking them to take a snapshot for him. But right after the letter, come the news about his death. When all the family gather for the shot, only Avag knows the truth.
title: Lusankar
plot_es: During the war, Avag's son sends his photo to the family asking them to take a snapshot for him. But right after the letter, come the news about his death. When all the family gather for the shot, only Avag knows the truth.
plot_en: During the war, Avag's son sends his photo to the family asking them to take a snapshot for him. But right after the letter, come the news about his death. When all the family gather for the shot, only Avag knows the truth.
